
```{r}
query <- "Costa Rica"

end_date <- "20190331"
all_results <- FALSE
```


```{r}
nytdata <- as_search(q = query, begin_date = begin_date, end_date = end_date, try_flatten = FALSE, all_results = )
```

```{r}
nytdata$data %>% 
  select(headline.main,abstract,pub_date, web_url)
```
